definitions.definition: The simplest kind of Lojban sentence, consisting of a selbri and some sumti , which fill in places in the selbri's "place structure". (More complex sentences can be formed by combining two or more bridi with conjunctions.)

main_definition: ( Lojban grammar ) The simplest kind of Lojban sentence, consisting of a selbri and some sumti , which fill in places in the selbri's "place structure". (More complex sentences can be formed by combining two or more bridi with conjunctions.)
